# -*- ck2.events -*-

################################################################################
# WARNING: Do NOT modify this file manually!

# This file is code-generated and any manual changes will be overwritten.

# Generated by src/religion_codegen.py
################################################################################

namespace = emf_religion_codegen

# Events emf_religion_codegen.0 and emf_religion_codegen.1 are meant to create and maintain dummy characters,
# each of whose sole utility is to have a specific religion as their public religion.
# They are used because some religion-based triggers (e.g. is_heretic, is_heresy_of,
# is_parent_religion) do not work in religion scopes and only check for characters' public
# religion, not their true religion. This means that in order to check whether a character's
# true religion complies with one of these triggers, the game needs to run the trigger on the
# dummy character whose public religion matches the given character's true religion.

# emf_religion_codegen.0 -- initialize dummy religion characters
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.0

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes
	
	religion = hip_religion

				dynasty = none
				religion = tondrakian
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}

				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { aztec = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_alive = yes } } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = aztec
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}

				}

			limit = { NOT = { taoist = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_alive = yes } } } }

				dynasty = none
				religion = taoist
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no

				set_immune_to_pruning = yes

				emf_do_not_disturb = yes

				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_religion_codegen.1 -- handle the death of a religion dummy character [on_death]
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	has_character_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character

	immediate = {
		religion_scope = {
			if = {
				limit = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { character = PREVPREV } }
				clear_persistent_event_target = emf_religion_dummy_character
				event_target:isis = { character_event = { id = emf_religion_codegen.0 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_religion_codegen.2 is used to initialize flags and variables saved in religion scopes that let scripts
# check for religion settings that normally could not be checked (e.g. whether priests can inherit, whether 
# a religion has divine blood mechanics, whether a religion enables Prepared Invasions, etc.).

# emf_religion_codegen.2
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.2
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes
	
	religion = hip_religion

	trigger = {
		has_landed_title = e_hip
		is_save_game = no
		NOT = { has_alternate_start_parameter = { key = religion_names value = random } }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		catholic = { emf_set_default_flags_for_catholic = yes }
		cathar = { emf_set_default_flags_for_cathar = yes }
		fraticelli = { emf_set_default_flags_for_fraticelli = yes }
		waldensian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_waldensian = yes }
		lollard = { emf_set_default_flags_for_lollard = yes }
		adoptionist = { emf_set_default_flags_for_adoptionist = yes }
		arian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_arian = yes }
		orthodox = { emf_set_default_flags_for_orthodox = yes }
		bogomilist = { emf_set_default_flags_for_bogomilist = yes }
		monothelite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_monothelite = yes }
		iconoclast = { emf_set_default_flags_for_iconoclast = yes }
		syriac = { emf_set_default_flags_for_syriac = yes }
		maronite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_maronite = yes }
		miaphysite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_miaphysite = yes }
		monophysite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_monophysite = yes }
		apostolic = { emf_set_default_flags_for_apostolic = yes }
		paulician = { emf_set_default_flags_for_paulician = yes }
		tondrakian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_tondrakian = yes }
		nestorian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_nestorian = yes }
		messalian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_messalian = yes }
		sunni = { emf_set_default_flags_for_sunni = yes }
		zikri = { emf_set_default_flags_for_zikri = yes }
		mahdiyya = { emf_set_default_flags_for_mahdiyya = yes }
		nabawiyya = { emf_set_default_flags_for_nabawiyya = yes }
		ibadi = { emf_set_default_flags_for_ibadi = yes }
		kharijite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_kharijite = yes }
		haruri = { emf_set_default_flags_for_haruri = yes }
		shiite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_shiite = yes }
		waqifi = { emf_set_default_flags_for_waqifi = yes }
		zaydi = { emf_set_default_flags_for_zaydi = yes }
		hurufi = { emf_set_default_flags_for_hurufi = yes }
		ismaili = { emf_set_default_flags_for_ismaili = yes }
		druze = { emf_set_default_flags_for_druze = yes }
		qarmatian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_qarmatian = yes }
		norse_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_norse_pagan_reformed = yes }
		norse_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_norse_pagan = yes }
		tengri_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_tengri_pagan_reformed = yes }
		tengri_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_tengri_pagan = yes }
		baltic_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_baltic_pagan_reformed = yes }
		baltic_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_baltic_pagan = yes }
		finnish_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_finnish_pagan_reformed = yes }
		finnish_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_finnish_pagan = yes }
		aztec_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_aztec_reformed = yes }
		aztec = { emf_set_default_flags_for_aztec = yes }
		slavic_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_slavic_pagan_reformed = yes }
		slavic_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_slavic_pagan = yes }
		west_african_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_west_african_pagan_reformed = yes }
		west_african_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_west_african_pagan = yes }
		zun_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_zun_pagan_reformed = yes }
		zun_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_zun_pagan = yes }
		hellenic_pagan_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_hellenic_pagan_reformed = yes }
		hellenic_pagan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_hellenic_pagan = yes }
		bon_reformed = { emf_set_default_flags_for_bon_reformed = yes }
		bon = { emf_set_default_flags_for_bon = yes }
		zoroastrian = { emf_set_default_flags_for_zoroastrian = yes }
		mazdaki = { emf_set_default_flags_for_mazdaki = yes }
		zurvanist = { emf_set_default_flags_for_zurvanist = yes }
		manichean = { emf_set_default_flags_for_manichean = yes }
		mandaean = { emf_set_default_flags_for_mandaean = yes }
		yazidi = { emf_set_default_flags_for_yazidi = yes }
		khurmazta = { emf_set_default_flags_for_khurmazta = yes }
		jewish = { emf_set_default_flags_for_jewish = yes }
		samaritan = { emf_set_default_flags_for_samaritan = yes }
		karaite = { emf_set_default_flags_for_karaite = yes }
		hindu = { emf_set_default_flags_for_hindu = yes }
		buddhist = { emf_set_default_flags_for_buddhist = yes }
		jain = { emf_set_default_flags_for_jain = yes }
		taoist = { emf_set_default_flags_for_taoist = yes }
	}
}
